paramDescriptions.label: Regen/sec
paramDescriptions.description: Passive regen (positive) or drain (negative) per second.

paramDescriptions.label: Clamp
paramDescriptions.description: Clamp value between min and max.

paramDescriptions.label: Easing
paramDescriptions.description: Default easing for over-time deltas (linear, easeInQuad, easeOutQuad, easeInOutCubic).

paramDescriptions.label: Scope
paramDescriptions.description: "object" = local to this object, "global" = registered in game.statistics by name, "local" = excluded from network sync.

paramDescriptions.label: Sync
paramDescriptions.description: "none" = no network, "authoritative" = this client owns & broadcasts, "replicated" = receives from network.
